badge_thumb.title: QR Badge creator
badge_thumb.desc: This simple application allow users to create and print badges with data codified in a qr code

json_csv_thumb.title: Json|Csv Converter
json_csv_thumb.desc: This tool do exactly what it is supposed to do: it converts files from json format to csv and viceversa

mep_vote_mapper_client.title: Check the vote
mep_vote_mapper_client.desc: This is the client used to interact with the data provided from Mep Vote Mapper app. It collect data about EU Parliament's plenary votations and the client allow users to visualize what each mep voted for each votation

mep_vote_mapper.title: Mep Vote Mapper
mep_vote_mapper.desc: This is a server that collect EU votations data and store them in a database, clean and organized. It allows also to manage data through a raw interface
